body.p:
Murray Ky Mch 4th 1861
His Excellency B. McGoffin
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

At the March Term of Calloway Equity & Criminal Court a Judgment for $ fine & fifteen days imprisonment was rendered ^in favor of Commonwealth of Ky^ against James Todd for a Breach of the peace I was not the Comths Atty at that term; but have been credibly informed that his guilt was incurred by defending his father -- an old man -- but was not able to clearly establish it to the Jury & would respectfully ask you to exercise you executive clemency in his favor by remitting that portion of the judgment that applies to imprisonment

Calloway Eq Ct
Remitted
15 days imprisonment
Jas. Todd
Issd Mar 14 1861
